snippet.title: Newer Super Mario Bros Wii: Holiday Special 100% Walkthrough Part 1 (All Star Coins & Secret Exits)
snippet.description:
Newer Super Mario Bros Wii: Holiday Special (Newer Holiday Special) - 100% Walkthrough Part 1 - World 1 - All Star Coins, Secret Exits & Bosses

Intro is the same as New Super Mario Bros. Wii (I cutted it out)
0:32 World 1-1 (All Star Coins)
2:39 World 1-2 (All Star Coins)
6:27 World 1-3 (All Star Coins + Secret Exit)
9:24 World 1-3 (Normal Exit)
11:20 World 1-Cannon
12:00 World 1-Tower / Fortress

~ Newer Super Mario Bros Wii: Holiday Special ~
A New Super Mario Bros Wii hack made by Newer Team to celebrate Christmas 2011.
The hack includes brand new stages, (all snow and ice themed), and even unique boss battles.

This is not a full game hack. Only World 1 (8 stages) have been updated.

I played this game on my original Wii using the Homebrew Channel and Riivolution. Note that you need the original New Super Mario Bros Wii to play this game. I used a Wii2HDMI and recorded this with my HD PVR 2 Gaming Edition Plus.

Twitter: twitter.com/sunnycrappys
